analysis.description:
ERC20 (/unique_chucks/3/0xd07f6b9dc4ab70d9a387b7573a805ea3970e53e5.sol#64-79) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/3/0xd07f6b9dc4ab70d9a387b7573a805ea3970e53e5.sol#67)

KNBaseToken (/unique_chucks/3/0xd07f6b9dc4ab70d9a387b7573a805ea3970e53e5.sol#79-159) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/3/0xd07f6b9dc4ab70d9a387b7573a805ea3970e53e5.sol#120-121)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/3/0xd07f6b9dc4ab70d9a387b7573a805ea3970e53e5.sol:
	Contract AirDropKNToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/3/0xd07f6b9dc4ab70d9a387b7573a805ea3970e53e5.sol#235-242)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in AirDropKNToken.fallback (/unique_chucks/3/0xd07f6b9dc4ab70d9a387b7573a805ea3970e53e5.sol#235-242):
	External calls:
	- assert(bool)(remainTokens() >= 500000000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/3/0xd07f6b9dc4ab70d9a387b7573a805ea3970e53e5.sol#236-237)
	- token.transfer(msg.sender,totalTokens) (/unique_chucks/3/0xd07f6b9dc4ab70d9a387b7573a805ea3970e53e5.sol)
	- token.freezeAccount(msg.sender,true) (/unique_chucks/3/0xd07f6b9dc4ab70d9a387b7573a805ea3970e53e5.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- receivedUser (/unique_chucks/3/0xd07f6b9dc4ab70d9a387b7573a805ea3970e53e5.sol)
